body.title: Source
body.p: The Source tab displays the form source code on the left side, while on the right side there is the form UI.
Letâ€™s remove this piece of the source code
body.codeblock:
Unsupported field type: Array

Cannot find form control for property candidateData.skills with type Array.

Some complex property types, such as Array aren't yet supported, however, you can still write your own component into the form and manually bind it.
body.p: and click the Execute form button. You will immediately see the result.
The same functionality is available for the React forms.
